'''''Middle-earth: The Dragons Player Guide''''' is a source-book for the [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]].

== From the publisher ==

This player guide for the ''MECCG'' features in-depth analysis and reference information for ''METD'' expansion using the same format as the ''METW Player Guide''.
